title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? title: Stunning 4-story custom-built home in Queen Village
description:
Welcome to 732 S Front Street- located on one of the best streets in Queen Village. This stunning 4-story custom-built home consists of 3 bedrooms, large den/bedroom/sunroom, and 2.5 bathrooms. Built in the 1960s, this home was designed to incorporate it's proximity to the river with its luxury ship-like features, including porthole windows, large open spaces, and stained glass windows.The first floor consists of a large garage with interior access, the utility closet, a half-bath off the entryway, the 4-Stop Elevator, and a den/ sunroom (which could be used as a fourth bedroom if needed) with access to the private patio and rear parking pad with remote control steel security gate. With over 3200 square feet livable space, this corner home is filled with natural sunlight, bay windows on three floors, and skylights in the primary sitting room and bathroom. But don't worry about too much light in the morning hours, the sunroom and the primary bedroom windows have powered and shuttered security gates to block any light and noise. On the second floor, you will find the Chef's Kitchen with Sub Zero refrigerator and Jenn-Air Electric Range, space for a breakfast nook, and a bay window with city views. The staircase opens up to the large open Dining Area featuring a double sided Marble-Clad Gas Fireplace that you can share with the sunken Living Room. Enjoy views of the Delaware River directly from your couch. On the third level, you'll find two great sized bedrooms, a full bathroom, the laundry room, a cedar closet, and your very own Cedar-Covered Sauna! If the stairs are too much, simply ride the elevator to the third floor which consists of your very own primary suite. A large east-facing bedroom with wall-to-wall sliding glass doors leading to a private deck will showcase the amazing view of the river. The hallway/sitting has more than enough storage with a whole hallway of closets for your wardrobe. The large primary bathroom features a double vanity, oversized shower, jacuzzi tub, and a water closet with bidet and small rear balcony with center city views. Your large rear patio is perfect for outdoor grilling and entertainment.

Floor to ceiling windows in the living and dining room allow for an extra sun-soaked space. Through the sliding glass doors, you'll find an EXTRA-LARGE outdoor space that is RARE in the city and perfect for grilling, entertaining, and pets. Head downstairs to find a laundry room that houses mechanicals and side by side washer and dryer. Continue down the hallway to find your first generously sized bedroom with ample closet space and a three-piece ensuite accented in white subway tile. Head back upstairs to find a hall powder room and a large owners suite with walk-in closet and large spa-like bathroom, with glass enclosed doors, subway tile and an in-shower bench for relaxation! This space is perfect for roommates, as you'll each have extra privacy with your very own bathrooms. This home is walking distance to Frankford Avenue and all Fishtown has to offer. Penn Treaty Park is directly across the street. Street parking is a breeze as no permits are required! This one is hard to beat - schedule your showing today!

title: A lower level family room offers durable carpet. ice cozy space for U.
description: This impeccable multi-level Bustleton split level home will give any new owner the right mix of space, location and value! Wonderful curb appeal leads you into a beautiful foyer with new carpets throughout the main level with the original hardwood underneath. The spacious living room and adjacent dining room are loaded with natural light thanks to a large bay window. The kitchen is organized and nicely updated with 42 inch oak cabinetry, black appliance package, ceramic backsplash, granite countertops, recessed lighting and ceramic tile floors. Upstairs are 3 generous sized bedrooms, all with carpeting and ceiling fans, plus an updated main hall bath with jetted tub. A lower level family room offers durable carpet, a half bath and a nice cozy space for watching television or hanging out with friends. There is a full unfinished basement which provides plenty of storage and the laundry area and still has room for a workout space or additional play area. The basement could easily be finished. One car garage and a driveway for additional parking, beautifully landscaped fenced in backyard with paver patio. This home has been lovingly maintained and is in terrific shape! You couldn’t ask for a more convenient location to hang your hat!
